list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactored and finalized full Wordle MVC architecture
- Rebuilt model layer (WordleGame, GameState, GuessResult, Dictionary, LetterFeedback) - Implemented correct Wordle evaluation logic with duplicate-letter handling - Added dictionary validation and ensured uppercase normalization - Fixed row-handling logic by moving active-row tracking into GameController - Replaced updateCurrentRow() with updateRow(row, guess) for stable UI behavior - Rewrote BoardView to eliminate row-jumping and color persistence bugs - Rebuilt KeyboardView with proper color precedence and reloadFromState() - Cleaned up MainFrame: focus handling, menu actions, save/load integration - Updated Input

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Application.Main.executor": "Run", "Application.modelMain.executor": "Run", "Application.viewMain.executor": "Run", "Downloaded.Files.Path.Enabled": "false", "JUnit.All in CS3560-Prog2-Graphics_Implementation.executor": "Run", "JUnit.All in test (1).executor": "Run", "JUnit.All in test.executor": "Run", "JUnit.DictionaryTest.executor": "Run", "JUnit.GameStateTest.executor": "Run", "JUnit.JvmTests.executor": "Run", "JUnit.WordleGameTest.executor": "Run", "JUnit.java in CS3560-Prog2-Graphics_Implementation.executor": "Run", "JUnit.test in CS3560-Prog2-Graphics_Implementation.executor": "Run", "Repository.Attach.Annotations": "false", "Repository.Attach.JavaDocs": "false", "Repository.Attach.Sources": "false", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager.252": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "com.intellij.ml.llm.matterhorn.ej.ui.settings.DefaultModelSelectionForGA.v1": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "kotlin-language-version-configured": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/nicol/IdeaProjects/CS3560-Prog2-Graphics_Implementation/src/main/test", "onboarding.tips.debug.path": "C:/Users/nicol/IdeaProjects/CS3560-Prog2-Graphics_Implementation/src/main/test/java/model/src/Main.java", "project.structure.last.edited": "Problems", "project.structure.proportion": "0.15", "project.structure.side.proportion": "0.2", "to.speed.mode.migration.done": "true" } }

task.summary:
Finished WorldGame.java
Added dictionary.java and dictionary.txt with functionality to check if the word exists in the dictionary.
Need to:
Add JVM Tests Create GUI

Finished WorldGame.java
Added dictionary.java and dictionary.txt with functionality to check if the word exists in the dictionary.
Need to:
Add JVM Tests Create GUI

Refactored and finalized full Wordle MVC architecture
- Rebuilt model layer (WordleGame, GameState, GuessResult, Dictionary, LetterFeedback) - Implemented correct Wordle evaluation logic with duplicate-letter handling - Added dictionary validation and ensured uppercase normalization - Fixed row-handling logic by moving active-row tracking into GameController - Replaced updateCurrentRow() with updateRow(row, guess) for stable UI behavior - Rewrote BoardView to eliminate row-jumping and color persistence bugs - Rebuilt KeyboardView with proper color precedence and reloadFromState() - Cleaned up MainFrame: focus handling, menu actions, save/load integration - Updated Input
